404.help: We can't find the page you're looking for. The page may have been moved or deleted. You can use the button below to get back to the home page.

link.home-page: Take me to the home page

top-level-communities.head: Communities in DSpace
top-level-communities.help: Select a community to browse its collections.

results.head: Search Results
results.no-results: There were no results for this search

metadata.title: DSpace Angular :: Metadata Registry
metadata.head: Metadata Registry
metadata.description: The metadata registry maintains a list of all metadata fields available in the repository. These fields may be divided amongst multiple schemas. However, DSpace requires the qualified Dublin Core schema.

schema.title: DSpace Angular :: Metadata Schema Registry
schema.head: Metadata Schema
schema.description: This is the metadata schema for "{{namespace}}".

bitstream-formats.title: DSpace Angular :: Bitstream Format Registry
bitstream-formats.head: Bitstream Format Registry
bitstream-formats.description: This list of bitstream formats provides information about known formats and their support level.

validation.pattern: This input is restricted by the current pattern: {{ pattern }}.

license.notgranted: You must grant this license to complete your submission. If you are unable to grant this license at this time you may save your work and return later or remove the submission.

sections.init-form-error: An error occurred during section initialize, please check your input-form configuration. Details are below :

form.group-expand-help: Click here to expand and add more elements

form.new-user: New user? Click here to register.

messages.expired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.

general.cannot_submit: You have not the privilege to make a new submission.

confirm.title: Discard submission
confirm.info: This operation can't be undone. Are you sure?

general.deposit_error_notice: There was an issue when submitting the item, please try again later.
general.discard_error_notice: There was an issue when discarding the item, please try again later.
general.metadata-extracted: New metadata have been extracted and added to the {{sectionId}} section.
general.metadata-extracted-new-section: New {{sectionId}} section has been added to submission.

upload.info: Here you will find all the files currently in the item. You can update the fle metadata and access conditions or upload additional files just dragging&dropping them everywhere in the page
upload.drop-message: Drop files to attach them to the item
upload.header.policy.default.nolist: Uploaded files in the {{collectionName}} collection will be accessible according to the following group(s):
upload.header.policy.default.withlist: Please note that uploaded files in the {{collectionName}} collection will be accessible, in addition to what is explicity decided for the single file, with the following group(s):

detect-duplicate.duplicate-help: Click here if this is a duplicate of your item
detect-duplicate.not-duplicate-help: Click here if this is not a duplicate of your item
detect-duplicate.note-help: Please enter your reason for the duplication into the box below.
detect-duplicate.clear-decision-help: Click for clear the decision about this pontential duplicate
detect-duplicate.disclaimer: The system has identified some potential duplicates. Please carefully review the list and flag each occurency with the appropriate choice or discard this submission.
detect-duplicate.disclaimer-ctrl: The system has identified some potential duplicates. Please carefully review the list and the submitter comments and perform the appropriate action.
detect-duplicate.disclaimer-no-match: All your feedback on potential duplicates have been registered correctly.

recycle.disclaimer: The following existent information are not valid within the selected collection. Please copy them to the appropriate metadata if applicable. Use the discard button to remove these information when done.
